ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes
CodeDisplayDefinition
EmCare.B6.DE19Does not appear to be UnderweightThe client is visually assessed for whether underweight by the health care worker and does not appear to be underweight (estimated weight based on height or age would be equivalent to WHZ= 0 / WAZ= 0)
EmCare.B6.DE20Appears to be UnderweightThe client is visually assessed for whether underweight by the health care worker and appears to be underweight (as an aide for dosing calculations) (estimated weight based on height or age would be equivalent to WHZ= -1 / WAZ= -1)
EmCare.B6.DE21Appears to be Severely UnderweightThe client is visually assessed for whether underweight and appears to be severely underweight (as an aide for dosing calculations) (estimated weight based on height or age would be equivalent to WHZ= -2 / WAZ= -2)

description.value: Codes representing possible values for the Provide an estimated age or estimated date of birth element

display.value: Does not appear to be Underweight

value.value: The client is visually assessed for whether underweight by the health care worker and does not appear to be underweight (estimated weight based on height or age would be equivalent to WHZ= 0 / WAZ= 0)

The client is visually assessed for whether underweight by the health care worker and appears to be underweight (as an aide for dosing calculations) (estimated weight based on height or age would be equivalent to WHZ= -1 / WAZ= -1)

The client is visually assessed for whether underweight and appears to be severely underweight (as an aide for dosing calculations) (estimated weight based on height or age would be equivalent to WHZ= -2 / WAZ= -2)
